TopicTitle: Game keeps crashing, need some help.

Articles.Content: I just installed the game after not playing it for a long time I don't have any mods installed I've verified the cache started it in 64x and 32x and it does the exact same thing and just gives me this error log: https://pastebin.com/uEw1YtM3

Is this a clean install? And by clean I mean: The last time you played it, did you remove everything? If you had some mods installed the last time you played it, they are probably still there. Check the GameData folder in your KSP install directory, there should be just 'Squad' and if you got the DLC 'SquadExpansion'. If there is anything else, delete it.
